title.rendered: Weekly Meal Plan for Sedentary Lifestyle Diabetes – Day 6

content.rendered:
In This Article

  • 1 Breakfast
  • 2 Lunch
  • 3 Snack
  • 4 Dinner

Breakfast

  • 1 bowl Melon and Strawberry Crunch
  • ½ cup Orange Juice, freshly squeezed

Lunch

  • 1 serving Roasted Butternut Squash
  • 2 Rye Crispbreads

Snack

  • 2 Smoked Salmon & Asparagus Rolls
  • 1 glass Kale and Tomato Juice, freshly made

Dinner

  • 1 large bowl Vegetable Chili
